Posts.Content: Wondering how many of you are still suffering the side effects of these drugs. I spent 10 years taking them and now that I'm done, which is almost a year, I still feel the lingering odd aches, pains and hot flashes. I have noticed an awful sagging of facial skin and deeper wrinkles..... Any comments???? I'm 59 and know that these all come with age, but I'm doubting its all age!!!!!
Posts.Title: After Tamoxifen and Femara
